dict.acceptation: 年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生；

sent.orig: We have lived like this year after year, and we have endured year after year.
sent.trans: 他们年复一年地这样生活著，又年复一年地这样忍受著。

sent.orig: They were in fashion last year and the year befor last year. But they're not in fashion this year.
sent.trans: 它们（指鞋子）去年以及前年是时兴的，但是今年不时兴了。

sent.orig: Christmas passes year after year, but as Chinese New Year, have different adornment theme every year.
sent.trans: 圣诞节年年过，但是跟华人新年一样，每年都有不同的装饰主题。

sent.orig: Leap-year day(every four years) and year-end day(every year) would be counted as extra Saturdays.
sent.trans: 人们把闰年日（每四年一天）和年末日（每年一天）视为外加的星期六。

sent.orig: Year after year I have had a letter from Arthur on New Year's Day.
sent.trans: 每年新年之际我都收到阿瑟的来信。
